name: Dr. Siham Benbrahim
description: Dr. Siham Benbrahim is an esteemed veterinarian specializing in large animal medicine, with a particular focus on livestock health and production. She has played a vital role in advancing veterinary care for livestock in Morocco, improving the quality of animal health services, and addressing issues related to food security. Dr. Benbrahimâ€™s work has helped optimize animal husbandry practices and enhance the productivity of the agricultural sector in Morocco. Through her contributions to veterinary education and research, she has been instrumental in shaping the future of veterinary medicine in the country.
